original_title: Cícero Dias, o Compadre de Picasso
overview: The Pernambuco painter Cicero Dias created an unparalleled art for the world. Close to a modernist and influenced by artists such as Pablo Picasso, Fernand Léger and Joan Miró, he marked the history of Brazilian art.
title: Cícero Dias, o Compadre de Picasso
